Rebecca Cottrell

Work Comics About Shop↝

About

I’m a illustrator and comic artist living in London. I’m a fan of emotionally-resonant absurdity, combining words and imagery, and Oubapo.

r.e.cottrell ✺ gmail.com

  • Common Market, Royal College of Art, April 2018

Education
